Body:
I am looking for software/online translator that defines words along with the translation. For example I typed in "I know someone named" into a french translator and it gave back

Je sais que quelqu'un nomm√©

I know Je means I and nomme means name. However, I have to manually look-up sais, que, and quelqu'un.

Do they make something like that? Free is preferable. thanks, Tim
Title: Software translator that gives word definitions
